description:
The Hamlet Veterinary Hospital, located in Ottawa East is looking for a 5th full-time small animal veterinarian.
We are a family owned 4-veterinarian practice that focuses on pets, customer care, high quality/dedicated team medicine approach and fear-free methods.
Our core values are honesty, transparency and integrity.
We cultivate a jovial atmosphere, take care of employees and respect their opinions and well-being.
Our goal is to have a work place where the whole team, the clients and the patients are happy.
Modern equipment, newly remodeled facility and 30 minutes appointments.
Excellent mentorship environment (surgery, dentistry and medicine). Very competitive salary and benefits to current market.
Flexible hours, no on calls, Closed every weekends and limited evening hours.
Schedule focusing on work-life balance and extremely flexible.
Family Health/dental benefits, no co-pay, CE, CVO included. Partnership possibilities. Check us on the web to see how highly our clients think of us.
Contact us at thehamletveterinaryhospital@gmail.com or baxa3366@hotmail.com and see if this is the place you are looking for.
Responsibilities:- Diagnose and treat animals with illnesses or injuries- Perform surgeries and other medical procedures as needed- Conduct regular check-ups and vaccinations- Provide preventive care and advice on nutrition and general pet care- Communicate with pet owners to explain diagnoses, treatment plans, and prognosis- Maintain accurate medical records of all patients- Collaborate with other veterinary professionals to provide comprehensive care
Skills:- Strong knowledge of veterinary medicine and procedures- Proficient in conducting laboratory tests and interpreting results- Excellent diagnostic and problem-solving skills- Effective communication and interpersonal skills to interact with pet owners and staff members- Ability to handle and restrain animals safely and compassionately- Attention to detail and ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Note: This job description is not exhaustive and may be subject to change or modification at any time.
Job Type: Full-time
Benefits:

 Company events
 Dental care
 Discounted or free food
 Employee assistance program
 Extended health care
 Flexible schedule
 On-site parking
 Paid time off
 Profit sharing
 Store discount
 Vision care

Flexible Language Requirement:

 French not required

Schedule:

 Monday to Friday
 No weekends

Supplemental pay types:

 Bonus pay
 Commission pay

Ability to Relocate:

 Gloucester, ON K1B 4Z6: Relocate before starting work (required)

Work Location: In person
